newsitem.title: What is MRALD?
newsitem.body: MRALD is a data delivery platform designed for analysts and other domain experts regardless of technical knowledge.

newsitem.title: Where to start?
newsitem.body: We recommed you start with the tutorial on the left. It will guide you through using a data retrieval form and show you many of the features that distinguish this platform from other products. There's an integrated form builder, also on the left, to create these forms.

newsitem.title: What else is there?
newsitem.body:
• MRALD ships with the Cewolf chart generating software. We've included the sample set of charts here.
  • It also ships with the Apache Axis2 web services platform, which is based on SOAP.
  • MRALD was built to be extended and customized. If you don't see what you want, let us know and we will work with you to see how easy or difficult your idea would be.

newsitem.title: What is MRALD?
newsitem.body: MRALD gives the user the power to search a database without requiring prior knowledge or expertise with databases. It runs on almost any platform and will access any database with a reasonably complete JDBC driver. MRALD allows for any database to be accessed easily via a web browser. Each project can have the same main page (like it's own Portal, where each user will see a personalized version of this main page).
